data.title: Leonard Graham Service Details - Waxahachie, Texas
data.meta_description: Leonard Riley Graham, age 74, passed away Saturday, April 17, 2010 at his home in Ennis. He was born August 23, 1935 in Waxahachie to R. Gentry and Minervia Graham. Survivors include one sister, Gale Oliver and one brother, Billy Graham and his wife Eula all of Waxahachie. Leonard was preceded in death by his parents; 4 sisters and 3 brothers. A memorial service will be held at 4PM Wednesday, April 21, 2010 in the chapel of the Boze-Mitchell-McKibbin Funeral Home with Reverend Billy Allen officiating.
